Just to be clear: I meant the fanfic writer, not this manga's writer.

Well, real life had kept the writer too busy, but finally they managed to wrote chapter one of an alternate story to this one. So if you found this too cruel and want to read a happy ending, you are all welcome!

When the guy in the last chapter says that his dad buys him dolls as a replacement for his mother is that supposed to mean his mom was turned into a sex doll? And what other branch is she talking about?
@rownini It's not finished. The writer has had a somewhat busy situation, but maybe they'll be able to pull chapter 1 before the end of the month. I'll keep you informed through here.

@LarsenSan is there any way I can read this fanfic because this just hurt me. Like you, I’m not saying the author or anyone who reads this is scum but I really need a happy ending to this. I used to at least be able to deal with things genres like ugly bastards, rape, ntr, etc. but this might have taken it completely out of me personally and now I need to read a TON of vanilla, feel good type stuff to feel better.
Just realized the dolls in page 223 are Rina and Kaho, the friends who were mentally broken until they volunteered as sexdolls.

@WaifuSlayer Yeah, I can't, I just can't, I do feel to bad. My only solace is that I know someone who's writing a fanfic based on this series, but where a heroine is transported to this world to change it, and it happens at the beginning of this very same manga. I've been told some spoilers and Irie won't end up well.

@LarsenSan Thats the fun, seeing all hope wither away until theyre nothing but a shell of their former selved.

You just need to cast aside your humanity to enjoy these things. Of course IRL this'd be disgusting.

I guess I'm becoming old... years ago, this would have been top notch fap material to me. Nowadays, I cannot even get hard reading this. It's way too cruel, the story it's too misogynistic to find enjoyment in it (mind you, I don't think the author is misogynistic nor this story would spread misogyny, please, don't call me a SJW, I can't be anymore further than that, I mean, I play SNK Heroines). Due to empathy I feel really bad for the victims, specially since the story don't have any kind of happy ending.
You're not always too old for dolls. Especially, sex dolls.
